mapper.select: select id, title, category, stock, line_price, sale_price from scenic_ticket where deleted = false and end_date > now() and scenic_id = #{scenicId} order by id desc
mapper.update: update scenic_ticket set stock = stock + #{num}, sale_num = sale_num - #{num}, total_num = total_num - #{num} where id = #{id} and stock + #{num} >= 0 and deleted = false
update scenic_ticket t, ticket_order r set t.stock = t.stock + #{num} where t.id = r.ticket_id and r.order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(min(sale_price),0) as minPrice, IFNULL(max(sale_price),0) as maxPrice from scenic_ticket where scenic_id = #{scenicId} and deleted = false
mapper.update: update scenic_ticket t, scenic r set r.score = #{score} where t.scenic_id = r.id and t.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.scenic_id, t.title, t.line_price, t.sale_price, t.category, t.introduce, t.real_buy from scenic_ticket t left join ticket_combine r on t.id = r.relation_id where r.ticket_id = #{ticketId} and r.deleted = false and t.deleted = false and t.state = 1
